name: AdventureAssistant
0:
”Alexa, tell Adventure Assistant that I am leaving.”
”Alexa, tell Adventure Assistant that I am off”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: adventure assistant
des: Adventure assistant prepare you before you leave for any adventure such as going to work, to school, or to the grocery store. Instead of saying multiple command, just a single command and the assistant will tell you about the weather and remind you what to bring before leaving the house.
